comment.author: 92583649@N04
comment._content: Being a Perth native, I'm intrigued by this picture supposedly from Flag Street. I know of no street in all of Perth by this name. Perhaps it was changed years back.. I have no clue as the exactly what street this really is.

comment.author: 75949244@N04
comment._content: It looks as though its going to the Town Hall - could it be William St ?

comment.author: 92558352@N05
comment._content: i'd say we are looking east along hay st from around about milligan st.

comment.author: 69746795@N05
comment._content: I agree looktall. That would make the church spire on the left the Methodist Church. Is that church old enough?

comment.author: 92558352@N05
comment._content: i think it's the wesley church.

comment.author: 33364206@N05
comment._content: this photo appears  in the book Perth and Fremantle Past and Present by Simon J Nevill pg 34 with the caption "Looking east along Hay Street from Milligan Street, Wesley Church and the Town Hall can be seen in the distance c. 1878
